abstract: Phillip Perea, former promotions producer for Fox station in Austin, Tex, shoots and kills himself outside Fox News headquarters in New York City.
lead_paragraph: Phillip Perea, a former promotions producer for a station in Austin, Tex., shot himself in the chest near the entrance to the building in Manhattan.

byline.contributor: Ravi Somaiya and Tatiana Schlossberg contributed reporting.

snippet: Phillip Perea, a former promotions producer for a station in Austin, Tex., shot himself in the chest near the entrance to the building in Manhattan.

headline.main: Fired Fox Employee Kills Himself Outside News Corp. Building
headline.print_headline: Man Kills Himself Outside Fox Offices
